      • resetPassword

        public ResetPassword resetPassword(ResetPasswordRequest request)
        Reset the password of the account identified by the corresponding 'reset password token' given in the requestparameters. This token mentioned above can be found in the email send as a result of handleResetPassword. This method can be used upgrade a light account to a full account.
        Parameters:
        request - Request data to be sent to the server
        Returns:
        Action to be executed asynchronously or synchronously

      • refreshAuthToken

        public RefreshToken refreshAuthToken()
        Asynchronously refreshes the auth token of the user account. Refresh token is needed for this action. If it's missing then null is returned.
        Returns:
        auth token

      • getAllSessions

        public SessionData[] getAllSessions()
        Get session data of all accounts registered on a device.

      • getSession

        public SessionData getSession()
        Method that returns session information of the active user.
        Returns:
        SessionData object containing accessToken, expireTime, refreshToken, tokenType and other data.
